choose_language: Choose your language to enjoy a seamless experience with Daily List.
plan_description: Take full control of your time. Set priorities, create a schedule, and achieve more each day
stay_focused_description: Want to be more productive? Focus on one thing at a time. Let us handle remembering everything else
collaboration_feature: Team up with your colleagues and finish projects quicker and better with our collaboration feature
welcome_message: Welcome to DailyList! We're excited to have you join us. Let's Sign in and make your day awesome!
name: Name
login_message: Sign in with your email and password to enjoy all the great features on DailyList!
sign_up_description: Curious about how to boost your productivity and achieve your goals? Sign up now and find out!
verification_sent: We have sent a verification code to the email address
create_account: Create your personal account now. With your email, you can access your account anytime, anywhere
by_signing_up: By signing up, you agree to DailyList
pick_status_description: Please select the status that best describes you currently, so we can optimize each user category in the future
student_desc: Someone studying at a school or university
employee_desc: An individual employed by a company or institution
freelancer_desc: A self-employed individual or Independent contractor
housewife_desc: A woman who keeps house and She is a homemaker
pick_needs_description: Select the task categories, list templates, and widgets that are perfect for your needs
welcome_aboard: Welcome aboard! Please sign in to start exploring our exciting features now
no_task_tomorrow: You don't have any tasks for tomorrow
quick_schedule: Quickly schedule your tasks, events, and reminders. Be in control of your day and get more done
logout_subtitle: You’ll have to sign in again once you’re back
bring_to_front_desc: Moving tasks to the top based on priority
send_to_back_desc: Moving tasks down in the priority list
delete_task: This task will be permanently deleted
confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete this?
delete_message_warning: Once you delete this message, it cannot be recovered
task_name: What is the name of your task
note_not_found: The requested note could not be found

delete_note_warning: This note will be permanently deleted.
